subject: Initiative to Support the Underserved Simulator Market
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I was hoping you could connect me with the right contact.  My name is 
Neil Schneider.  In my earlier career, I ran Meant to be Seen which is 
where the founders of Oculus first met among other things. I also serve 
as Executive Director of The International Future Computing Association 
(TIFCA).

I'm working with a team of content producers and industry experts to 
develop a new initiative to help grow the sales of simulators (e.g. sim 
racing, flight simulators, etc.) and the vendors that support them.  We 
believe the simulator market is underserved, and if certain 
opportunities are realized, vendors could benefit from stronger revenue 
potential and customer retention.

Examples of products that could benefit from this effort include PC 
components (e.g. CPU, GPU, motherboards, etc.), gaming peripherals (e.g. 
wheels, flight sticks, pedals), immersive devices (e.g. VR HMDs, 
haptics), rigs, simulators, and more.

I would be grateful for the opportunity to share our ongoing research 
with hopes that we can find opportunities to work together.

Regards,
Neil
--
